summary:
Hi guys, this is still a steel sword, but this time I had this was in accordance with the method of production katana to do, and the way to do a scabbard.
Please note that the blade gloss and steel lines, we call this the steel lines is Jihada;
Jihada : Itamehada

descriptionHtml:
Hi guys, this is still a steel sword, but this time I had this was in accordance with the method of production katana to do, and the way to do a scabbard.
Please note that the blade gloss and steel lines, we call this the steel lines is Jihada;
Jihada : Itamehada


Thanks:
screenshot of ZHT858

Introduction :
use 1.5K texture.(1024*1024*1 & 1024*512*2)
Models tris:11608
Up to the Skyrim weapon is 3700 tris, so it's a very slight loss of computer hardware.
It is divided into 1hd and 2hd

How to get:
steel forging

Install：
just use NMM to install this mod! or use launcher.

Uninstall：
also use NMM to uninstall or use launcher.
author: Nemon Kafei
